## Results- Historical

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, out.width="70%", fig.align='center'}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(viridis)
library(scales) 

bps_mn <- read_csv("data/BPS_MN.csv")


bps_mn1<-bps_mn%>%
  mutate(Acres = Count*0.2223945)%>% ##Calculate acres
  mutate(Percentage = Acres / sum(Acres) * 100)%>%## percent
  filter(!is.na(SI_FRG))


bps_mn1$SI_FRG <- factor(bps_mn1$SI_FRG, levels = c("Rare","Intermediate","Frequent"))



##give colors to bar
custom_colors <- c("Frequent" = "red", "Rare" = "skyblue2", "Intermediate" = "green4")

ggplot(bps_mn1, aes(x=Percentage,y=SI_FRG, fill = as.factor(SI_FRG)))+
  geom_bar(stat= "identity")+
  scale_fill_manual(values = custom_colors)+
  labs(title = "Historical Fire Frequency", caption = "Derived From LANDFIRE BpS Data")+
  ylab("Frequency Group")+
  scale_x_continuous(labels = label_comma())+
  theme_bw()+
  theme(legend.position = "none")
  

```

  filter(!is.na(Freq))

evt_mn1$Freq <- factor(evt_mn1$Freq, levels = c("Rare","Intermediate","Frequent"))

##give colors to bar
